Title: No Way to Treat a Lady
Plot: Charlie wants to help Daisy with her porn career, while Hanks starts writing Lew Ashby's biography. Becca has her first day at a private school, while Karen meets Sonja and Julian again.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Angus MacFadyen, Callum Keith Rennie, Carla Gallo, Judy Greer, Paula Marshall
